channel.title: feincms on Dipankar's blog
channel.description: Recent content in feincms on Dipankar's blog

item.title: FeinCMS and DjangoCMS
item.description: Spent sometime working with both over the last month, created 2 ecommerce sites around these and here are some observations which may help people decide what works for them FeinCMS was a pain to get started with, i had to base it all on the default example as the documentation was not enough to get it all started from scratch. I was using the trunk as it has goodies [like a blog] which the stable did not have.
